pr_title: Add java API to add or remove CustomizedStateAggregationConfig

timeline.message:
Add java API to add or remove CustomizedStateAggregationConfig

In this commit the below APIs have been added.
1- addCustomizedStateAggregationConfig
2- removeCustomizedStateAggregationConfig.
Tests have been added to check the functionality of these APIs.

Add java API to add or remove CustomizedStateAggregationConfig

In this commit the below APIs have been added.
1- addCustomizedStateAggregationConfig
2- removeCustomizedStateAggregationConfig.
Tests have been added to check the functionality of these APIs.

timeline.bodyText: If a user would like to add one type of state or remove one type of state, how to do it? It seems the API is to add or remove the config as a whole, but in most cases, we will use it as a way to add/remove one item in the list view.
timeline.author: zhangmeng916

replies.bodyText: Fixed. I just Added two new APIs.
replies.author: alirezazamani

timeline.message: Add API for adding and removing type from config
Add API for adding and removing type from config
